endpoints.description: Will respond with a Json of all attack operators.

attributes.name: _id
attributes.description: The id of the operator.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the operator.

attributes.name: badge
attributes.description: Url endpoint for the operator badge image.

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: Url endpoint for the operator image.

attributes.name: bio
attributes.description: Background story of the operator.

attributes.name: ability
attributes.description: Operator unique ability referrenced from the Abilities Endpoint. See Abilities for more info.

attributes.name: primaries
attributes.description: Array of operator primary weapons referenced from the Weapons endpoint. See Weapons for more info.

attributes.name: secondaries
attributes.description: Array of operator secondary weapons referenced from the Weapons endpoint. See Weapons for more info.

attributes.name: gadgets
attributes.description: Array of operator gadgets referenced from the Gadget endpoint. See Gadgets for more info.

attributes.name: armor_rating
attributes.description: Numeric value for operator's armor rating. Ranges 1-3.

attributes.name: speed_rating
attributes.description: Numeric value for operator's speed rating. Ranges 1-3.

attributes.name: organization
attributes.description: Military Organization the operator is involved with.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Defines if the operator is an attack or defense operator.

endpoints.description: Will respond with a Json of a specific operator with the given id.

attributes.description: The id of the operator.

attributes.name: badge

attributes.name: armor_rating

attributes.name: speed_rating

attributes.name: organization
attributes.description: Military Organization the operator is involved with.

endpoints.description: Will respond with a Json of all game maps.
Will respond with a Json of a specific game map with the given id.
Will respond with a Json of all game basic gadgets.

attributes.name: _id
attributes.description: The id of the gadget.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the gadget.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description and background of the gadget.

attributes.name: assignment
attributes.description: Defines if the gadget is assigned to attack or defense operators.

attributes.name: uses
attributes.description: Numerical value for the amount of uses a gadget can be used.

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: Url endpoint for the gadget image.

endpoints.description: Will respond with a Json of a specific gadget with the given id.

attributes.name: uses

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: Url endpoint for the gadget image.
